workshoptitle: Disaster Recovery RackWare Deployment on OCI

tutorials.title: Prerequisites
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable).

Lab 2: Configure APEX instance for DR
Lab 3: Setting Up RackWare DR components
Lab 4: Complete DR Configuration & Perform Failover
